shell.description: It can be used to break out from a restricted environment by spawning an interactive system shell.

file-read.description: It can read files, and may be used to perform privileged reads or discloe files outside a restrited file system

limited-suid.description: It can perform execution in a privileged context, given the SUID bit is set

sudo.description: It can perform execution in a privileged context, given the user can run the binary with sudo
